name: Strength
description: Training focused on increasing muscle strength and power.

name: Hypertrophy
description: Training aimed at increasing muscle size and volume.

name: Endurance
description: Training designed to improve stamina and cardiovascular health.

name: Power
description: Training that combines strength and speed to enhance explosive movements.

name: Weight Loss
description: Training and nutrition plans aimed at reducing body fat.

name: Weight Gain
description: Training and nutrition plans aimed at increasing body mass.

name: Maintenance
description: Training and nutrition plans aimed at maintaining current fitness levels and body composition.

name: Cardio
description: Training focused on improving cardiovascular health and endurance.

name: HIIT
description: High-Intensity Interval Training designed to burn fat and improve cardiovascular fitness.
